document.full_text: a professional clown accused of kidnapping and raping a 12-year-old california girl in 2002, while wearing his clown mask and make-up, was arrested on friday, nine years after the crime.
document.title: party clown arrested in 2002 rape of 12-year-old girl
lines_and_colors: a professional clown accused of kidnapping and raping a 12-year-old california girl in 2002, while wearing his clown mask and make-up, was arrested on friday, nine years after the crime.
